Question
========
The professor makes a scatterplot of the relationship between years and bullying, indicating the three educational categories with different colors. What characteristics/conditions should be present in this scatterplot?

![](uu-ANCOVA-883-nl-graph01.jpg)

Answerlist
----------
* A linear relationship between years and bullying
* For each color a linear relationship between years and bullying
* A linear relationship between years and bullying with a normal distribution for each color (each education category)
* A linear relationship between years and bullying and the regression rights of the three categories run parallel
